addinformation:
Package Details:

  • 50GB Highspeed 5G Data with instant data connection and Unlimited Voice
  • Network: Operates on Telus in Canada
  • UNLIMITED international text and picture messaging
  • Voicemail - Up to 35 minutes of messages
  • Up to 1,000 minutes of International Calling:  Argentina, Australia, Bangladesh, Brazil, China, Colombia, Costa Rica, France, Germany, Hong Kong, India, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Mexico, Netherlands, Nigeria, Pakistan, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Singapore, Spain, Sri Lanka, Taiwan, United Kingdom, United States, and Vietnam.
  • Validity: Starts immediately after receiving QR code
  • Compatibility: Supports Android and iOS devices (refer to FAQ for compatible handsets)

Usage Restrictions:

  • E-SIM works only within Canada

Travel Recommendations:

  • Choose travel dates within 5 days from the current date

Supported Destination:

  • Canada
